Edushifts On Tour

Presente

Uniting diverse narratives in education

New approach to education needs a new approach to society

How?

We build a network of networks of changemakers and educational initiatives around the world and foster transformative and self-organized development.

Be part of a global movement. Be the change!

Our mission

To connect 1000 people who can change education. Let’s spread love in our society!

Our goal

In 2018 10.000 transaction taken place, 500 spaces mapped, 200 stories told. Everybody in alternative education knows about this campaign and 15000 EDUshifters support this social experiment.

Who can be part of EDUshifts?

Who can be part of EDUshifts?

Influencers - Opinion leaders pioneers in education

Curate content. Contribute to publications. Keynote Speakers at EDUhacks. Authors of books.

Entrepreneurs

Work on their projects at EDUhacks. Seek for co-founders, inspiration and challenges during EDUonTours.

Activists&Innovators

Participate in EDUonTours and EDUhacks, challenges and conferences. Create stuff, seek inspiration.

Geeks - digital nomads, social Activists

Participate in conferences and workshops. Network. Leanr stuff. Promote new solutions and spread knowledge via media.
